sources.title: Beggars in Ermine
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Beggars in Ermine
sources.description: John "Flint" Dawson (Lionel Atwill) is a down to earth steel mill general manager who loses control of his factory when he is crippled in an accident and manipulated by a lecherous lawyer and unfaithful wife to sign over his power of attorney. Destitute, he travels the country organizing the homeless to help him regain control of his factory.

sources.title: Beggars in Ermine (1934) LIONEL ATWILL
sources.description:
Stars: Lionel Atwill, Betty Furness, Henry B. Walthall
Director: Phil Rosen

John Dawson loses control of his factory when he is crippled in an accident caused by a rival. Destitute, he travels the country organizing the homeless to help him regain control of his steel mill.

sources.title: Beggars In Ermine ( 1934) B Pre Code Drama From Monogram Pictures Starring Lionel Atwill
sources.description: An ousted, crippled steel magnate (Lionel Atwill) forms the world's beggars into a brotherhood of economic power.

metadata.Plot: John Dawson loses control of his factory when he is crippled in an accident caused by a rival. Destitute, he travels the country organizing the homeless to help him regain control of his steel mill.
metadata.Actors: Lionel Atwill, Betty Furness, Henry B. Walthall
